body_html:
Since nvidia/cuda:7.5-cudnn4-devel is from ubuntu:14.04, we should only need to copy one line from Dockerfile.cpu to Dockerfile.gpu:

RUN /install/install_proto3.sh

Where we already install autoconf, automake and cmake 3.x in install_deb_packages.sh.

body:
Since nvidia/cuda:7.5-cudnn4-devel is from ubuntu:14.04, we should only need to copy one line from Dockerfile.cpu to Dockerfile.gpu:

`RUN /install/install_proto3.sh`

Where we already install autoconf, automake and cmake 3.x in install_deb_packages.sh.
